federalBenefits.name: Free VA Healthcare (Priority Group 1-3)
federalBenefits.description: Veterans with a combined rating of 50% or higher qualify for free VA healthcare with no copays.

federalBenefits.name: Commissary & Exchange Privileges
federalBenefits.description: Veterans with service-connected disabilities can shop at military commissaries and exchanges.

federalBenefits.name: Beneficiary Travel Reimbursement
federalBenefits.description: Veterans with a 30% or higher rating can receive mileage reimbursement for VA medical appointments.

federalBenefits.name: CHAMPVA for Spouse & Dependents
federalBenefits.description: Spouses and children of veterans rated Permanent and Total (P&T) qualify for CHAMPVA health insurance.
benefits: Covers dependents not eligible for TRICARE

federalBenefits.name: Chapter 35 Education Benefits (DEA)
federalBenefits.description: Dependents of veterans rated Permanent and Total qualify for Dependents' Educational Assistance (Chapter 35).

federalBenefits.name: Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
federalBenefits.description: Additional compensation for veterans with severe disabilities requiring aid and attendance or specific loss of use.
benefits: For loss of use of limbs

federalBenefits.name: Annual Clothing Allowance
federalBenefits.description: Annual payment for veterans whose prosthetic devices or medications damage clothing.
benefits: For damaged clothing due to prosthetics

federalBenefits.name: Specially Adapted Housing (SAH) Grant
federalBenefits.description: Grant to help veterans with certain service-connected disabilities adapt their home or purchase an adapted home.

federalBenefits.name: Automobile Allowance & Adaptive Equipment
federalBenefits.description: One-time payment toward purchase of vehicle and ongoing adaptive equipment reimbursement.

federalBenefits.name: Program of Comprehensive Assistance for Family Caregivers
federalBenefits.description: Stipend and benefits for family caregivers of veterans with serious service-connected disabilities.

federalBenefits.name: Veterans' Group Life Insurance (VGLI)
federalBenefits.description: Convertible term life insurance for veterans who had SGLI while in service.
benefits: No medical exam if within 1 year

federalBenefits.name: Veterans' Mortgage Life Insurance (VMLI)
federalBenefits.description: Mortgage protection for veterans with severe service-connected disabilities who receive SAH grants.
benefits: Pays off mortgage if veteran dies

alabama.name: Property Tax Exemption (Disabled Veterans 10%+)
alabama.description: $7,500-$10,000 exemption on homestead property for disabled veterans

alabama.name: Veterans Education Grant (VEG)
alabama.description: Up to $5,000/year for eligible veterans attending Alabama public colleges
benefits: Can be combined with GI Bill

alabama.name: Disabled Veteran License Plates
alabama.description: Free special license plates for disabled veterans (10%+)

alaska.name: Property Tax Exemption (Disabled Veterans 10%+)
alaska.description: $150,000 assessed value exemption for disabled veterans; full exemption at 100% P&T
benefits: Full property tax exemption at 100% P&T

alaska.name: Veterans Education Grant (VEG)
alaska.description: Up to $4,500/year for eligible veterans attending Alaska schools

alaska.name: Alaska Permanent Fund Dividend (No State Income Tax)
alaska.description: All Alaska residents including veterans receive annual Permanent Fund Dividend; no state income tax

alaska.name: Free Hunting & Fishing Licenses
alaska.description: Disabled veterans (50%+) receive free lifetime hunting and fishing licenses

arizona.description: Disabled veterans (40%+) receive free hunting and fishing licenses
